anya-e1211n:10: Bho buddhā tumhepi kho maṁ pāletha.
anya-e1211n:21: Buddhassa bhagavato iddhi kiṁ na kare
anya-e1211n:69: Bho guṇavaṁ purisa tvampi dānaṁ dehi
anya-e1211n:70: Bho guṇavanto purisā tumhe dānaṁ detha
anya-e1211n:89: Bho gacchaṁ yaññadatta tvaṁ maṁ pālaya
anya-e1211n:191: Jantumpetaṁ kaṭaṁ kāremi teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:192: Jantupete kaṭaṁ kārema teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:195: Jantunā riyena yo koci sukhaṁ pāpuṇati
anya-e1211n:196: Jantūhi ariyehi ye keci sukhaṁ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:209: Bho satthā tvaṁ sadevakaṁ lokaṁ pālaya
anya-e1211n:223: Satthari dhammarāje ko bhattiṁ na ghaṭīyati
anya-e1211n:408: Bho yāgu tvaṁ pana khudaṁ bhana
anya-e1211n:428: Bho mātā tvaṁ pana ciraṁ jīva
anya-e1211n:454: Jambuyā kho pana yo koci jīvati
anya-e1211n:455: Jambūhi kho pana ye keci jīvanti
anya-e1211n:520: Guṇavatā kulamhā na apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:521: Guṇavantehi kulehi na apenti ye keci
anya-e1211n:530: Bho gacchaṁ guṇavaṁ tvaṁ pana sugatiṁ gacchāhi
anya-e1211n:550: Bho aṭṭhi saṅkhalikaṁ tvaṁ aniccato passa
anya-e1211n:554: Aṭṭhinā kāyena yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ nimmitaṁ
anya-e1211n:555: Aṭṭhīhi kāyehi yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ nimmitaṁ
anya-e1211n:570: Bho daṇḍī tvaṁ pana kammaṁ karohi
anya-e1211n:584: Daṇḍini pana me mano na ramati
anya-e1211n:585: Daṇḍīsu kho pana me manā na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:590: Bho āyu tvaṁ pana jīvitaṁ pālehi
anya-e1211n:604: Āyūmhi kho pana manaṁ patiṭhitaṁ sabbadā
anya-e1211n:605: Āyūsu kho pana manaṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:611: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e1211n:616: Kānici pana saheva etesaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ idaṁ.
anya-e1211n:622: Bho sabbā bhuta kalyāṇaṁ karohi kusalā sadā;
anya-e1211n:623: Bho sabbe purisā bhaddaṁ karotha kusalaṁ sadā.
anya-e1211n:625: Sabbe bhojāpayī te tu sā nakhīyittha bhojanaṁ.
anya-e1211n:636: Sabbasmiṁ buddhadhamme ca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:637: Sabbesu ca vihāresu thūpe kāresi khattiyoti.
anya-e1211n:640: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṅkā therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e1211n:641: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṁ visaṁ khitaṁ.
anya-e1211n:642: Bho sabbe ca paje tvampi dānaṁ dadāhi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:643: Bho sabbāyo pajā tumhe sīlaṁ rakkhatha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:645: Sabbāyo diṭṭhiyo hantvā khemaṁ gacchanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1211n:646: Sabbassā assu kaññāya niccaṁ kammaṁ karīyyate;
anya-e1211n:649: Sabbāhi ca nadīheva khettaṁ vapati kassako.
anya-e1211n:650: Sabbassā assu kaññāya cittaṁ nadeti paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:652: Sabbassā pana taṇhāya vimuttassa natthi bhayaṁ;
anya-e1211n:655: Sabbāsaṁ pana gaṅgānaṁ mahogho hoti sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:656: Sabbassā neva kaññāya cittaṁ ramati paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:657: Sabbāsu ceva gaṅgāsu macchā caranti sabbadāti.
anya-e1211n:662: Bho sabbā bhūta kalyāṇaṁ puññaṁ karohi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:663: Bho sabbānica bhūtāni puññaṁ karotha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:664: Sabbaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ samādāya pāraṁ tiṇṇosi brāhmaṇo;
anya-e1211n:665: Sabbāni assu puññāni katvāna tidivaṁ gato.
anya-e1211n:676: Sabbasmiṁ puññakammeca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:700: Pubbā yā kāci kaññā bahuṁ puññaṁ akarī
anya-e1211n:701: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo bahuṁ puññaṁ akaruṁ
anya-e1211n:702: Bho pubbe kaññe bahuṁ puññaṁ akaro
anya-e1211n:703: Bho pubbā kaññāyo bahuṁ puññaṁ akarittha
anya-e1211n:704: Pubbaṁ yaṁ kiṁci kaññaṁ puññaṁ kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:705: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo puññe kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:706: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya puññaṁ kataṁ
anya-e1211n:707: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi puññāni katāni
anya-e1211n:708: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci anucarī
anya-e1211n:709: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi keci anucariṁsu
anya-e1211n:710: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya ābharaṇaṁ adadī
anya-e1211n:712: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci puriso apeto.
anya-e1211n:713: Pubbāhi yāya kāhici kaññāhi keci purisā apetā
anya-e1211n:714: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya mātāpitaro ahesuṁ
anya-e1211n:716: Pubbāyaṁ yāya kāyaci kaññāyaṁ cittaṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ
anya-e1211n:717: Pubbāsu yāsu kāsuci kaññāsu cittaṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e1211n:720: Pubbaṁ yaṁ kiṁci pana bahuṁ puccaṁ akarī
anya-e1211n:721: Pubbāni yāni kānici bahuṁ puññaṁ akaruṁ
anya-e1211n:722: Bho pubba bhūta tvaṁ bahuṁ puññaṁ akaro
anya-e1211n:723: Bho pubbāni bhūtāni bahuṁ puññaṁ akarittha
anya-e1211n:724: Pubbaṁ yaṁ kiṁci puññaṁ kārāpayī ekacco
anya-e1211n:725: Pubbāni yāni kānici puññe kārāpayiṁsu ekacce
anya-e1211n:752: Ekassa garuno kho pana parikkhāro hoti
anya-e1211n:753: Ekesaṁ garūnaṁ kho pana guṇaghoso hoti
anya-e1211n:758: Ekā kaññā pana devadattaṁ kambalaṁ yācate
anya-e1211n:776: Ekaṁ kulaṁ pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:794: Yo koci taṁ purisaṁ odanaṁ pācāpeti
anya-e1211n:795: Ye keci taṁ purisaṁ odanaṁ pācāpenti
anya-e1211n:796: Yaṁ kiṁci dāsaṁ gāmaṁ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:797: Ye keci dāse gāmaṁ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:802: Yassa kassaci dānaṁ deti saddho sappuriso
anya-e1211n:812: Yā kāci vanitā pana dāsiṁ kammaṁ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:813: Yā kāci vanitāyo dāsī kamme kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:814: Yaṁ kiṁci vanitaṁ puññaṁ kārāpeti puriso
anya-e1211n:815: Yā kāci vanitāyo puññaṁ kārenti purisā
anya-e1211n:816: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sāmi bhattaṁ bhojāpīyate
anya-e1211n:817: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sāmi bhattaṁ bhojāpito
anya-e1211n:818: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sukhaṁ pāpuṇāti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:819: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sukhaṁ pāpuṇanti sāmikā
anya-e1211n:820: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya ābharaṇaṁ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:821: Yāsaṁ kāsaṁci vanitānaṁ ābharaṇaṁ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:822: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:823: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:826: Yāyaṁ kāyaṁci vanitāyaṁ me cittaṁ na ramati
anya-e1211n:827: Yāsu kāsuci vanitāsu me cittāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:830: Yaṁ kiṁci kulaṁ pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:831: Yāni kānici kulāni bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:832: Yaṁ kiṁci bahuṁ puññaṁ kārāpeti koci
anya-e1211n:833: Yāni kānici bahuṁ puññaṁ kārenti keci
anya-e1211n:863: Tesu bhikkhūsu pana me mano ramati.
anya-e1211n:866: Sā khattiyakaññā pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:880: Tāyaṁ khattiya kaññāyaṁ pasīdati yo koci
anya-e1211n:884: Taṁ kulaṁ niccaṁ bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:885: Tāni kulāni pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:886: Taṁ kulaṁ uddissa puññaṁ karoti koci
anya-e1211n:887: Tāni kulāni uddissa puññāni karonti keci
anya-e1211n:902: Eso sisso ca garuṁ dhammaṁ pucchati
anya-e1211n:903: Ete sissā ca garuṁ dhammaṁ pucchanti
anya-e1211n:920: Esā vanitā pana dāsiṁ kammaṁ kārāpeti.
anya-e1211n:930: Etāya vanitāya pana yo koci apeti
anya-e1211n:931: Etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti
anya-e1211n:938: Etaṁ kulaṁ pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:940: Etaṁ kulaṁ pana passati yo koci
anya-e1211n:941: Etāni kulāni pana passanti ye keci
anya-e1211n:944: Etena kulena pana jano sukhaṁ pāpuṇāti
anya-e1211n:945: Etehi kulehi pana janā sukhaṁ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:946: Etassa kulassa kho pana dhanaṁ dadāti dhanavā
anya-e1211n:947: Etesaṁ kulānaṁ pana dhanaṁ dadanti dhanavantā
anya-e1211n:948: Etasmā kulamhā kho pana ekacco na apeti
anya-e1211n:949: Etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti
anya-e1211n:952: Etasmiṁ kulamhi pana me mano ramati
anya-e1211n:953: Etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:956: Ayaṁ jano pana taṁ purisaṁ puññaṁ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:957: Ime janā te purise puññaṁ kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:974: Ayaṁ kaññā pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:984: Imāya kaññāya pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:985: Imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:992: Imaṁ cittaṁ pana attano santānaṁ vijānāti
anya-e1211n:1000: Imassa cittassa ovādaṁ deti yo koci
anya-e1211n:1001: Imesaṁ cittānaṁ ovādaṁ denti ye keci
anya-e1211n:1010: Asu mahārājā catuhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṁ toseti
anya-e1211n:1016: Amunā mahārājena kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1017: Amūhi mahārājehi kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1024: Amusmiṁ mahārāje kho pana mahājano pasīdati
anya-e1211n:1025: Amūsu mahārājesu kho pana mahājanā pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1028: Asu upāsikā pana sakkaccaṁ dhammaṁ suṇāti
anya-e1211n:1034: Amuyā upāsikāya yo koci pana sucarati
anya-e1211n:1035: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana sucaranti
anya-e1211n:1039: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana apenti
anya-e1211n:1043: Amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1046: Aduṁ dhanavaṁ niccaṁ bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:1064: Kohi nāma budho loke vasaṁ kodhassa gacchati;
anya-e1211n:1065: Ke hitvā mānusaṁ dehaṁ dibbaṁ yogaṁ upaccaguṁ.
anya-e1211n:1066: Kaṁsi tvaṁ assu uddissa pabbajito ca āvuso;
anya-e1211n:1067: Keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṁ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1068: Kenāyaṁ pakato satto kuvaṁ sattassa kārako;
anya-e1211n:1069: Kehidaṁ pakataṁ bimbaṁ kvannu bibbassa kārako.
anya-e1211n:1070: Kena te tādiso vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati;
anya-e1211n:1071: Kehi me puññakammehi mamaṁ rakkhanti devatā.
anya-e1211n:1073: Kesaṁ divāca rattoca sadā puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati.
anya-e1211n:1075: Kehi nāma ariyehi puthageva jano ayaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1076: Kassa tvaṁ dhammamaññāya vācaṁ bhasayi īdisaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1078: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhimuttamā;
anya-e1211n:1082: Kā ca suphassayaṁ dānaṁ mañcapīṭhādikaṁ adā;
anya-e1211n:1083: Kāyo nānāvidhaṁ puññaṁ katvāna tidivaṁ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1084: Kaṁ bhāvanañca bhāveti kaṁ sīlaṁ paripālayī;
anya-e1211n:1085: Kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko.
anya-e1211n:1086: Kāya upāsikāyassu dhammo ca sūyate sadā;
anya-e1211n:1087: Kāhi ca sīlavatīhi dhammo ca sūyate sadā.
anya-e1211n:1088: Kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idaṁ sukhaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1089: Kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1093: Kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahānadī.
anya-e1211n:1094: Kassā kho pana gaṅgāya mahogho hoti sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:1095: Kāsaṁ kho pana kaññānaṁ ābharaṇā bhavanti ca.
anya-e1211n:1096: Kassaṁ nadiṁ pana macchā niccaṁ vicaranti sadā;
anya-e1211n:1097: Kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccaṁ vicaranti sadā.
anya-e1211n:1100: Kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṁ te ajinasāṭiyā;
anya-e1211n:1101: Kāni cittāni jāyanti kathaṁ jānema taṁ mayaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1102: Kiṁ tvaṁ attavasaṁ disvā mama dajjāsimaṁ dhanaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1103: Kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṁ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1106: Kenāsi dummano tāta purisaṁ kannu yocasi;
anya-e1211n:1107: Kehi pupphehi sakkaccaṁ saddho yajati gotamaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1108: Kassa so kayirā mettiṁ tamāhu cariyaṁ budhā;
anya-e1211n:1110: Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṁ iti rājā apucchitaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1111: Kehi nāmapi hetūhi jāyantīti ime janā.
anya-e1211n:1114: Kasmiṁ me sivayo kuddhā nāhaṁ passāmi dukkaṭaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1115: Kesu puññesu yojeti sakhīnaṁ so sakhāhitoti.
anya-e1211n:1164: Tayā cittamhā kho pana bhayaṁ uppajjati
anya-e1211n:1168: Tayi citte kho pana kusalacittaṁ patiṭhitaṁ
anya-e1211n:1238: Vo no te meti rūpāni padāni padato yato;
anya-e1211n:1239: Tato nāmikapantīsu natū vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e1211n:1241: Sāmissa vacane ceva vo no saddo pavattati.
anya-e1211n:1242: Karaṇe sampadāne ca sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e1211n:1243: Te me saddoti viññeyyo viññunā nayadassināti.
anya-e1211n:1606: Dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṁ katvā sataṁ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1609: Taṁ lakkhanti vuccati, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṁ katvā dasasatasahassaṁ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1623: Nava nāgasahassāni nāge nāge sataṁ rathā
anya-e1211n:1624: Rathe rathe sataṁ assā asse asse sataṁ narā
anya-e1211n:1625: Nare nare sataṁ kaññā eke kissaṁ satitthiyo
anya-e1211n:1631: Kamo kaccāyane eso pāliyā so virujjhati
